page.title: 11Kevin Smith's school day
page.content:
Kevin Smith is a sixteen year old in his final year of compulsory schooling at Ryde High School.
TIMETABLE 7.00 = Get up. 8.00 = Yellow(L.E.A) bus to Havenstreet.Service bus to school. 8.45 = School,do homework if not done last night. First lesson. 10.30 = Break for quarter of an hour. 10.45 = Another lesson until 12.00. 12.00 = 1 hour lunch.Fast food or snacks.You can get drinks,sausage rolls,doughnuts etc. Most people stay for sandwiches but Kevin has snacks. 1.05 = Another lesson. 2.20 = Break for 10 minutes. 2.30 = Final lesson. 3.45 = End of lesson , then Kevin catches his bus home.
